summary: This changes a few spells in the game and makes them similar to that of Morrowind and Oblivion
descriptionHtml:
This mod is very similar to this mod
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3743
But i have changed a few things regarding the flames and Healing spell 
The healing spell is now instant much like oblivions and the flames are now in fireball form.

the old one will be taken down very soon. 
If you encounter any problems please comment,

Enjoy
author: Garrett
